newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Rate cut in line with low inflation - Costello.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Rate cut in line with low inflation - Costello.

text.p: Australian Treasurer Peter Costello said on Friday today's reduction in official interest rates is consistent with a low inflation policy.
Costello also told reporters that banks should pass on the interest rate reduction to their customers.
The Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) announced earlier on Friday it would cut official cash rates to 5.5 percent from 6.0 percent previously.
